Articles.Content:
<p>* **<iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/5z2-ODBw5FA" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>You want more info about <strong>KerbalKon</strong>? You got it! The full schedule was released today and can be read right <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60806-KerbalKon-Schedule-Videos"><strong>here</strong></a>.</p>

<p>Many of your favorite <strong>Squad</strong> members, <strong>KSP-TV</strong> personalities, <strong>YouTube</strong> personalities and many more will take part in the festivities. Big announcements, big surprises and astronaut <strong>Ed Lu</strong>! <strong>KerbalKon</strong> 2013 will be one to remember.</p>

<p>One major element of <strong>KerbalKon</strong> has to do with update<strong> 0.23</strong>. We’re going to be spilling all the <a href="http://bit.ly/1fl5A72"><strong>details</strong></a> on the release that just so happens to be launching this <strong>Tuesday, December 17</strong>.</p>

<p>So grab your boosters, attach your struts and join us for two full days of <em><strong>KSP</strong></em> awesomeness!</p>

Overall Reactions:

1st 2 paragraphs -

3rd paragraph -
I might be able to persuade my mom to let me stay home from school for 2 days? Right? Someone write a quick note for my mom explaining how important it is!
Alas, I'm going to be up in Phrae for the whole thing with no computer or internet, sadness.

Remember around 0.14 and 0.15 when they gave release dates?

Hope this works well.

Oh and YEAAAA!

-epic music playing in the background-

-jaw drops-

-smoke rises from the floor-

you get the picture..

*Gigawatts Intensifies*

Seriously great news!! Can't wait!

*WAITING INTENSIFIES*

I love you guys!
I love the announcements of announcements

1st 2 paragraphs: Interesting. Interesting.

3rd paragraph: OMG IS THAT A RELEASE DATE? WOOWOOWOOWOOWOOWOO- *accidentally runs into cluster of sharp spikes on a rocket in 0.22*

That's amazing, it just happens to be the same day I have my first interview for the RAF and then I'm meeting Cmdr Chris Hadfield! Almost hard to believe anything could be so coincidental. But awesome
I love how at 0:45 in the video the space station has a bunch of mainsails on it. Awesome!
It's funny how those kerbals think they can SSTO off of Eve with just that! Pshaw!
one does not simply use a jet pack to get into orbit from Eve
Definitely excited for this one.
It's the 17th give me update gimme gimme!

It's the 17th give me update gimme gimme!

they usually release them around morning CST/late afternoon CET
Gimme Update
It's today!! woohoo all the excitement!
Does anyone remember the time when they released the last update where they issued a release date? (0.22)
I swear there are so many impatient people, me on the other hand have stuff to do while i wait for steam to update it :3 like cleaning the folders, mixing and going to get my haircut!
I thought the last update with a scheduled date was 0.18 but I could be wrong.. twiddle your thumbs some more
0.18 was released i believe last year's Kerbalkon, right after it finished they put it up for download.. crashed their servers hardcore
Where is .23? It's been the 17th here for 18 hours! Squad what is gong on??!

Where is .23? It's been the 17th here for 18 hours! Squad what is gong on??!

Came here to say that. But then I thought about it once more and remembered that Squad is in the Americas. So for us Euro people and everything further east is probably going to be released on the 18th
